trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>可依索引個別存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全所述但<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>，和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>文件。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the PathSegmentCollection class provides several special features: PathSegmentCollection objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可凍結的功能︰**因為它繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>類別 PathSegmentCollection 類別提供數個特殊功能︰ PathSegmentCollection 物件可以宣告為多個物件之間共用，變成唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，而進行安全執行緒。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的不同功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements* One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 隱含集合用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements*一或多個宣告使用物件項目語法的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> class with the specified collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>具有指定的集合類別<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that make up the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>構成物件<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: collection is .
trans-unit.target: collectionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>類別指定的容量或數目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>集合是一開始能夠儲存的物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>集合是一開始能夠儲存的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, they are copied when they are used.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>物件衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，使用時，將它們複製。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might not be able to later retrieve or remove the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> you added to the collection using the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> in the collection is a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> and is considered a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> than the one you added.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可能無法稍後擷取，或移除<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>您加入至集合以原始<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>物件;<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>集合中是原始檔案的副本<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>會被視為不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>比您所加入。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 不同於一般實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，此實作會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果您嘗試新增**null** (**Nothing**) 參考。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The segment to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的區段。

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of all segments and resets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*> to zero.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合的所有區段，並重設<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*>為零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會變更<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection>容量

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>，指出是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>會包含在集合內。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>搜尋。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is contained within the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>包含集合內，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 複製整個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>到一維<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>陣列，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始。

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection's items are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 集合的項目是要複製到其中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index of `array` at which to start copying the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 索引`array`要開始複製的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小於零。

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: array是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of items in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: -在來源中的項目數大於可用空間index至目的地結尾array。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of path segments contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得中所包含的路徑線段數目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of path segments contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的路徑線段數目<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: 也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>前進至第一個項目之前讀取<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>值集合的列舉值</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>會傳回相同的物件直到<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>下一個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 集合的末端後，列舉程式會放置在集合中，最後一個項目之後和呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，則呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>的第一個項目集合一次，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>後面加上<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之間修改集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>會傳回設定為時，項目，即使列舉值已經無效。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取因此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator> that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>可逐一查看集合。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的第一個出現的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The item to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的項目。

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> into this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 插入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>到這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 不同於一般實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，此實作會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果您嘗試插入**null** (**Nothing**) 參考。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert `value`, the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的索引`value`，指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>。
